department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Master Agreement - Standing Offer Consultants services Architecture and Engineering CSC
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada, publishes this request for standing offers (DOC) to qualify up to 4 architecture and engineering firms to respond to future projects of the Department of Correctional Service from Canada . All details relating to the requirement can be found in the invitation to tender.",
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement

#### Project Details

*  **Tender Reference**: WS3964400861-Doc4334355361
*  **Publication Date**: 2023-12-01
*  **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-02-19T14:00:00
*  **Expected Contract Start Date**: None
*  **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-07-01
*  **Tender Status**: Expired

#### Service Requirements

*  We are seeking up to 4 firms specializing in architecture and engineering.
*  The selected firms will be required to respond to future projects of the Correctional Service Canada. 
*  All details related to the service requirement can be found in the attached [invitation to tender](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18166486?extsite=MTgxNjY0ODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

#### Technical Specifications

*  The services shall include:
  - Architectural engineering
  - Building construction management

#### Procurement Details

*  **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
*  **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*  **Selection Criteria**: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
*  **Limited Tendering Reason**: None

#### Contact Information

*  For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact:
  - **Lussier, Joël** (SPAC/PSPC)
  - **Email**: joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Contracting Entity

*  **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
*  **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
*  **City**: Gatineau
*  **Province/State**: Quebec
*  **Postal Code**: K1A 0S5
*  **Country**: Canada
